name: Jyut Tou's Moon Garden
description:
Help Jyut Tou plant and harvest ingredients for his elixirs!

Drag seeds onto garden beds to plant them.

Click on plants to water them. Plants grow at the end of each day if they've been watered.

Clicking on a plant that is fully grown will harvest it instead, yielding points and seeds (if you're lucky, you may get rare seeds!). Plants that take longer to mature are worth more points.

Drag fertilizer onto plants to double their points value.

Earn loonies by harvesting plants that are in demand and spend them to get fertilizer.

You can perform 5 moves per day. Try to earn as many points as possible in 28 days!

Made for Global Game Jam 2023.
